aProposContenu: This application was created to simplify the management of the rules of your favorite games. Whether it's for an evening with friends or an afternoon with family, you can quickly access the rules, add players, and follow the game with ease.
aProposAuteur2: using Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, and a lot of passion for board games and web development üêµ.
